name: .EV3E
summary: Learn about .EV3E files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

instructions: You can open EV3E files with the LEGO MINDSTORMS EV3 (Home and Education versions) in Windows or macOS. For example, to open an EV3E file, select File â†’ Add Experiment.

To view EV3E files in a project, click the wrench icon at the top-left of the Project screen in the application. You can also click Import at the bottom of the window to open EV3E files from this screen.
